name: Can you Blend?
description:
Play the role of a box, adventuring across a strange land with many guard towers! Find platforms to change your color and your pattern, and blend in to avoid being caught! If you're caught, you'll have to try again from the start.

Developed in 4 hours 40 minutes for Trijam 123.

2 hours art

1 hour 15 minutes wrangling unity's level editor and animations

1 hour 10 minutes programming

15 minutes music and sound

Controls

Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys or Gamepad

Screenshots
